com.android.view

类 ShapeButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextView
          • com.android.view.ShapeButton
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.TintableBackgroundView, android.support.v4.widget.AutoSizeableTextView, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener

    public class ShapeButton
extends android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextView
    Created by Relin
    on 2018-10-24.
    此控件主要是为了方便不写xml的shape
    利用代码创建shape,跟shape一样支持
    图形类型，填充颜色、边缘线设置，属性名称也一致，
    同时为了避免事件的点击冲突采用的是集成自定义的TextView控件。
    this control is primarily for shape
    , which does not write XML
    create shape with code that supports just like shape
    graphic type, fill color, edge setting, same property name,
    at the same time, in order to avoid the click conflict of events,
    the integration of custom TextView control is adopted.

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawDrawable

        protected void drawDrawable()

      • createShape

        public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable createShape(int shape,
                                                      int strokeWidth,
                                                      int strokeColor,
                                                      int solidColor,
                                                      float cornerRadius,
                                                      float topLeftRadius,
                                                      float topRightRadius,
                                                      float bottomLeftRadius,
                                                      float bottomRightRadius)
        创建Shape 这个方法是为了创建一个Shape来替代xml创建Shape. create shape drawable this method create you self background drawable by shape.the same as code in xml.
        参数:
        shape - 类型 GradientDrawable.RECTANGLE GradientDrawable.OVAL
        strokeWidth - 外线宽度 button stroke width
        strokeColor - 外线颜色 button stroke color
        solidColor - 填充颜色 button background color
        cornerRadius - 圆角大小 all corner is the same as is the radius
        topLeftRadius - 左上圆角 top left corner radius
        topRightRadius - 右上圆角 top right corner radius
        bottomLeftRadius - 底左圆角 bottom left corner radius
        bottomRightRadius - 底右圆角 bottom right corner radius
        返回:
